aircraft.value: Sentinel-15 - AC-6009-792 at Sector West Station

defect_observed.value: Fuel nozzle blockage. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 15/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 18/10/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 20/10/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 19/10/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 20/10/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
